modName: Sorcha Vampire Custom Voiced Follower With Preset - DELETED
summary: Adds Sorcha a Vampire custom voiced follower with over 100 lines, location and NPC aware, a custom follower framework, custom skin and custom armor. In CBBE and UUNP versions.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[color=#cfe2f3][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS]My second attempt at a custom voiced follower went very well. I think I'm finally getting the hang of things. This version utilizes random MAIN dialog (follow, wait, trade, etc). She also will comment about different NPC's and locations throughout Tamriel. The custom follower framework works well with AFT but not tested on other follower mods with the exception that you will get an extra "do something for me". line. She comes with custom armor and packs a pretty good punch in the combat area. I also modified Fair Skin to look more like cold vampire skin. Endorsements are welcomed and any DP points for my mods will go to charity. 
Both CBBE and UUNP versions use Fair Skin Wet Textures. 

LOCATION: Broken Fang Cave or coc brokenfangcave01 into the console.
Voice type: Salty
Non-Essential (I like a challenge).
Race: Vampire
Height: 1.0
Weight: 100
Class: Spellsword
Combat: Ranged, Melee, and Magic with Vampire Drain and Frostbite as spells.
Can be married with silent dialog.[/font]



[font=Comic Sans MS]Credits:[/font]
